select_region: Select the region to apply filters to:
select_filters: Select one or more of the filters and draw* the area in which to perform the research.
draw_advise: Please note: areas will be shown in full, even if your research perimeters only include them partially.
markers_map: The markers in the map show the points matching your search criteria. Proceed to next step to save the results.
markers_map_warning: ⚠️ It looks like there are empty layers in this research. Please note: empty layers will not be shown in the saved project
markers_map_warning_empty_only: ⚠️ Only empty layers appearing in this research. Please add layers with results to save the project.
markers_map_view: The markers in the map show the points matching your search criteria.
confirm_deletion_message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
confirm_send_idra_message: You are publishing this dataset in Idra
